about_the_game:
Ascend to Immortality


Enter this action-packed, arena RPG with your Champions, ascend the ranks, and battle your way to immortality. On your path to ascension, collect powerful resources, train your champion, explore player-generated dungeons, and defeat monsters, and other Champions for fame, wealth, and eternal glory.

Collect your unique Champions and hone their fighting prowess in the arena as you earn glory on the sand and blood. Breed your Champions to create new gladiators. Ascend them to higher tiers in order to access better abilities and even greater power.

Bleeding is Believing


Play in a variety of different arena game modes to prove your skill:

Raid Boss PvE
Face off against a fearsome enemy alongside a team of Champions. You got what it takes to beat the monsters of Massina?

3v3
Team up with your trusted allies to face off in teams of three. Win or lose – but don’t end up impaled on the spike trap.

Free-For-All
Total chaos reigns. 20 fighters brawl, grab power-ups and avoid fire pits as they seek to be the last Champion standing.

Build Your Tower and Raid Others!


Champions Ascension gives you the tools to customize your tower the way you like it! Use our tools in the game and wrap your level that fits your style. When you are done creating your levels, defend them with your Champions to keep other players from taking your loot!

Craft Your Ultimate Weapon and Armor


Champions come equipped with default weapons, but players will be able to craft and upgrade with resources found in the arena. By using bone and other resources, players can craft new weapons and armor. For a Gold fee, players can use the Bonesmith’s crafting services or they can use player-owned Forges to add cosmetic customization to their gear, with higher-level Forges offering more options.

Features

  • Battle. Participate in a variety of game modes that will challenge your battle prowess. 1v1, 3v3, FFA, Raid Bosses, and much more! Enter the arena alone or with friends and climb the leaderboards to see who is the Champion.
  • Collect. When you battle in the various arenas and game modes you get a variety of resources. Different resources perform different actions in the game and provide different rewards.
  • Craft. Champions come equipped with default weapons, but players will be able to craft and upgrade with resources found in the arena. By using bone and other resources, players can craft new weapons and armor. For a Gold fee, players can use the Bonesmith’s crafting services to add cosmetic customization to their gear, with higher-level Forges offering more options.
  • Ascend. Ascending a Champion to a higher tier improves their stats, allows them to have more offspring, unlocks exclusive battle modes and areas in the game, and grants access to additional Feat Cards and Feat Slots. Each tier also has different daily earning limits for Essence, a valuable resource used in the game.
  • Own. Own a variety of Champions. We have 12 Families in all and you can own each one!
  • Social Hub. Congregate with fellow Champions in an open social hub where you can group up, dance, chat, and play mini-games to pass the time.
  • Seasonal Content. Our world is living and thriving. The actions in the game will affect the overall visual and game feel in the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows PC
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 6th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 GPU
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows PC
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8th Gen or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 GPU or higher
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
